settings.displayName:
Trigger IFTTT Webhooks: https://ifttt.com/maker_webhooks

<Voice Command>
- send command
- trigger command
- run command
- execute command

For example, if you have a Webhook with an event name "turn_off_light" in IFTTT, you can trigger this Webhook by asking Nigel, "send command", and then say, "turn off light".

Your IFTTT Key can be found here: https://ifttt.com/services/maker_webhooks/settings

<Contact Us>
